title: Learner-Tailored Program Repair: A Solution Generator with Iterative Edit-Driven Retrieval Enhancement
data:
Z Dai, Z Zhao, H Wang, X Tang, S Wu, C Yao, Z Gao- arXiv preprint arXiv, 2026
With the development of large language models (LLMs) in the field of programming, 
intelligent programming coaching systems have gained widespread attention. 
However, most research focuses on repairing the buggy code of programming
